components/shared/role/RoleImage/RoleIma.source:
<template>
  <NuxtImg
    :aria-label="getRoleNameLabel(roleName)"
    class="role-image"
    :height="sizes"
    :src="roleImageSrc"
    :width="sizes"
  />
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import type { RoleImageProps } from "~/components/shared/role/RoleImage/role-image.types";
import { useRoleName } from "~/composables/api/role/useRoleName";

const props = withDefaults(defineProps<RoleImageProps>(), {
  sizes: "50",
  definition: "normal",
});

const { getRoleNameLabel } = useRoleName();

const runtimeConfig = useRuntimeConfig();

const roleImageSrc = computed<string>(() => {
  const apiBaseUrl = runtimeConfig.public.werewolvesAssistantApi.baseUrl;
  const imageSuffix = props.definition === "normal" ? "" : `-${props.definition}`;
  return `${apiBaseUrl}/public/assets/images/roles/${props.roleName}/${props.roleName}${imageSuffix}.jpeg`;
});
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.role-image {
  border-radius: 10%;
  border: 3px solid #1c1c1c;
}
</style>

components/shared/role/RoleTypeBadge/Rol.source:
<template>
  <VuePrimeBadge
    v-p-tooltip="$t(`components.RoleTypeBadge.descriptions.${roleType}`)"
    :aria-label="$t(`components.RoleTypeBadge.roleType`)"
    class="role-type-badge"
    :severity="roleTypeBadgeAttributes.severity"
    size="large"
    :value="$t(`shared.role.type.${roleType}`)"
  />
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import type { BadgeProps } from "primevue/badge";

import type { RoleTypeBadgeProps } from "~/components/shared/role/RoleTypeBadge/role-type-badge-types";
import { RoleTypes } from "~/composables/api/role/enums/role.enums";

const props = defineProps<RoleTypeBadgeProps>();

const roleTypeBadgeAttributes = computed<BadgeProps>(() => {
  const roleTypesBadgeAttributes: Record<RoleTypes, BadgeProps> = {
    [RoleTypes.VILLAGER]: { severity: "success" },
    [RoleTypes.WEREWOLF]: { severity: "danger" },
    [RoleTypes.LONELY]: { severity: "info" },
    [RoleTypes.AMBIGUOUS]: { severity: "warning" },
  };
  return roleTypesBadgeAttributes[props.roleType];
});
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
  .role-type-badge {
    cursor: help;
  }
</style>

tests.name: Parameters Menu Component should render component and match snapshot when mounted.
Parameters Menu Component Parameters Menu Button should open the parameters menu when clicked.
Parameters Menu Component Parameters Menu Button should not open the parameters menu and throw error when clicked if the menu is not found in refs.
Parameters Menu Component Parameters Menu should pass the correct items to the menu when mounted.
Parameters Menu Component Parameters Menu should navigate to home page when clicking on back to home button.
Role Type Badge Component should render component and match snapshot when mounted.
Role Type Badge Component Badge should have tooltip when mounted.
Role Type Badge Component Badge should translate role type when mounted.
Role Type Badge Component Badge 'should have severity of danger when role type is werewolf.'
Role Type Badge Component Badge 'should have severity of success when role type is villager.'
Role Type Badge Component Badge 'should have severity of warning when role type is ambiguous.'
Role Type Badge Component Badge 'should have severity of info when role type is lonely.'
NavBar Component should render component and match snapshot when mounted.
NavBar Component Home Page Link should have the prop 'to' set to home page when mounted.
NavBar Component Home Page Link Werewolves Assistant Logo should have the prop 'src' set to the small logo when mounted.
NavBar Component Home Page Link Werewolves Assistant Logo Text should translate the logo text when mounted.
NavBar Component Parameters Menu should have left tooltip when mounted.
Role Image Component should render component and match snapshot when mounted.
Role Image Component Image should have default width and height from props sizes when mounted.
Role Image Component Image should have src based on role name from props when mounted.
Role Image Component Image should have small suffix for src when definition from props is small.
Index Page Component should render component and match snapshot when mounted.
Index Page Component Title should display translated title when rendered.
Index Page Component Play button should display play button with translated label when rendered.
Index Page Component Play button should display play button with pass through data when rendered.
Index Page Component About button should display about button with translated label when rendered.
Role Origin Badge Component should render component and match snapshot when mounted.
Role Origin Badge Component Badge should have tooltip when mounted.
Role Origin Badge Component Badge should translate role origin when mounted.
Roles Store should have initial state when created.
Roles Store fetchAndSetRoles should fetch roles when called.
Roles Store fetchAndSetRoles should set roles when called.
App Component should render component and match snapshot when mounted.
App Component should render component without shallow and match snapshot when mounted.
App Component should fetch and set roles from store when mounted.
Index Page Footer Component should render component and match snapshot when mounted.
Index Page Footer Component Contact Me Button should render contact me with translated text button when rendered.
Use Role Name Composable getRoleLabel should translate role when called with role name.
Use Fetch Roles Composable fetchRoles should fetch roles when called without options.
Use Fetch Roles Composable fetchRoles should fetch roles when called with options.
I18n module Locales should contain all keys set in fr locale when locale is en.
Default Layout should render component and match snapshot when mounted.
